Title: Drifters
Writer: Sandro Veronesi (novel), Matteo Rovere (screenplay), Laura Paolucci (screenplay), Francesco Piccolo (screenplay)
Actors: Andrea Bosca, Miriam Giovanelli, Claudio Santamaria, Michele Riondino
Plot: In this taboo drama, Mete must fight against his inappropriate attraction to his 17 year old half sister, who has just moved in to his flat in Rome. (Italian with English subtitles).
